column4: I'm having some issues getting X to run.  When i startx or xinit the screen blanks.  I have an ATI x800xl, I've tried the ATI, vesa and fglrx drivers.  Does anyone have any suggestions?
i know how to start x
sorry for the snippy response just fed up with this :(
none of it works -- Xorg.0.log shows no obvious errors either
you did remove the stylus/wacom settings from xorg.conf ?
x800 definitely works, so don't panic
xorg.conf is here: http://daemon.stanford.edu/~ring/xorg.old and the Xorg.0.log is here: http://daemon.stanford.edu/~ring/xorg.old
xorg.conf is here: http://daemon.stanford.edu/~ring/xorg.old and the Xorg.0.log is here: http://daemon.stanford.edu/~ring/Xorg.0.log
get rid of #1 - all the wacom stuff, & 2# all the modes except bpp24
i removed all the modes but 24 adn all the wacom stuff -- still no luck
lspci lists that as the proper busid for the card
i've had it working in suse and that is the same busid used
